subject: VAM Pro question
description_text:
Hi,

Are all 8 effects of the VAM Pro supported in iRacing directly through
SIMSONN Manager software?

Thanks,
Adam

conversations.body_text: Hi Adam Dera, Our SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 currently supports more than ten racing games, and I will send you the details of the supported features for your reference. In addition, our pedals are also compatible with SimHub 9.9.3, which provides telemetry support for over one hundred racing games.

Hi,

Thank you for the table, that's really informative, but that doesn't answer
my question.

I'm interested in the VAM Pro haptic reactors, and what effects are
supported in iRacing. Which of the 8 effects listed ( including speed,
clutch, tyre slip, RPM, ABS, gear shift, traction control (TC), and tyre
lock) are supported in iRacing. And i they are not supported by the Simsonn
Manager are all of them supported using SimHub in iRacing?

Thanks,
Adam

On Fri, Aug 29, 2025 at 2:25 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Adam Dera,  You may also check the official SimHub website for more information. Their support is more comprehensive, and since SimHub has been released and updated for a longer period, it offers broader functionality and better compatibility.
Hi Adam Dera,  Currently, the vibration effects we support in iRacing include: speed, clutch, RPM, ABS, and gear shifting.
